org.daisy.pipeline.braille.dotify.impl

Class BrailleFilterFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.braille.dotify.impl.BrailleFilterFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class BrailleFilterFactoryImpl
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.translator.BrailleFilterFactory

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BrailleFilterFactoryImpl.BrailleFilterImpl
      BrailleFilter wrapper for a org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.BrailleTranslator.FromStyledTextToBraille Supports special variable assignments (in the form of "def:foo") and tests (in the form of "ifdef:foo" or "ifndef:foo") in text attributes in order to support special ad hoc handling of marker-references.

      • cssStyledTextFromTranslatable

        protected static Iterable<org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.BrailleTranslator.CSSStyledText> cssStyledTextFromTranslatable(org.daisy.dotify.api.translator.Translatable specification)
        Convert Translatable specification to text + CSS style. Text attributes are assumed to contain only CSS or special variable assignments/tests. CSS inheritance is assumed to have been performed already.
